title: Smoked salmon scotch egg with chive beurre blanc
description: Try this elegant scotch egg with its delicate beurre blanc and a healthy dose of greens - perfect for a dinner party starter.
ingredients: 6 medium free-range eggs (for hard boiling), plus 2 extra, beaten
salt and freshly ground black pepper
110g/4oz Japanese panko breadcrumbs (use ordinary breadcrumbs if unavailable)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
